hotels.title: Five-Star Costa Brava Wine & Golf Retreat Just Two Hours From Barcelona
hotels.description: Escape to Spain's Costa Brava to embrace a new type of healthy hedonism at the five-star Hotel Peralada Wine Spa & Golf. Spend your days teeing off at the Peralada Golf Club, sipping on Spanish wines at the Perelada Winery, or indulging in a sensory journey at the Wine Spa, where treatments are inspired by the surrounding vineyards. Come evening, choose between five dining options, including the Michelin-starred Castell Peralada Restaurant, before returning to your warm and elegant accommodation for a tranquil night's sleep.
